name: Calvert App UI Sample
tagline: Web app design sample for a financial administrative system
body:
### See it in action
See the whole thing: http://bit.ly/1ouUCDg

### Purpose
I created this page to mock up a UX and layout for one page/screen in a hypothetical financial web application. The page uses Bootstrap 3, my favorite framework to date. Among other things, you really can't argue with its responsive design and plugin support.

### Author
The Calvert Foundation logo is owned by the Calvert Foundation. All design and code by me, @jordajm. 

### Contact
Please contact me at jordajm@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
